item.title: Say Hello To The Next 10 Big Switch 2 Games
item.description:
The Switch 2 had a good, successful first year with great first-party choices, including Mario Kart World , Donkey Kong Bananza , and even something more niche like Hyrule Warriors: Age of Imprisonment . Then there were great third-party ports like Bravely Default: Flying Fairy HD Remaster , Cyberpunk 2077: Ultimate Edition , and Yakuza 0 Director's Cut . 2026 and beyond have some good first-party and third-party content on the horizon, too.

Players can look forward to everything from platformers to shooters to RPGs on the Switch 2, and some of these will be launching sooner rather than later. So, anyone with a Switch 2 wondering what they can get excited for, which could be huge deals on the level of Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 , these are the games to keep on the wishlist.

Final Fantasy 7 Remake Intergrade

Uploading The Cloud

Final Fantasy 7 Remake
Released
April 10, 2020

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
T for Teen due to Language, Suggestive Themes, Use of Alcohol and Tobacco, Violence
Genre(s)
Action RPG
Powered by
  • Planned Release Date: 1/22/26
  • Planned Systems: Switch 2 and Xbox Series X/S

Final Fantasy 7 Remake was originally released on the PS4 in 2020, and then in 2021, the Final Fantasy 7 Remake Intergrade version was released on PS5 and PC with additional content like a photo mode and a Yuffie-based campaign.

This next Switch 2 version won’t add much new, but it is impressive to be running so well on the console, based on the demo that is out there now. This action RPG remake of the Midgar section of Final Fantasy 7 wowed players back in 2020, and it could be big again on a new set of consoles.

Resident Evil Requiem

A Newbie And An Oldie

Resident Evil Requiem
Survival Horror
Action
Adventure
Shooter
Systems
Released
February 27, 2026

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

Developer(s)
Capcom
Genre(s)
Survival Horror, Action, Adventure, Shooter
Platform(s)
PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Nintendo Switch 2, PC
Powered by
  • Planned Release Date: 2/27/26
  • Planned Systems: PC, PS5, Switch 2, Xbox Series X/S

Resident Evil Requiem’s Switch 2 edition may not be as good as the other consoles, but either way, it is a massively hyped game since the last mainline release was in 2021. The plot for this one revolves around a new character, Grace, going to Raccoon City to investigate a series of murders.

Her sections will rely on exploration and hiding, while Leon’s section will be more action-based. The return of a beloved favorite like Leon should get the hype train blowing smoke all the way until its February release date.

Pokemon Pokopia

Minecraft: Ditto Edition

Pokémon Pokopia
Life Simulation
Simulation
Systems
Released
March 5, 2026

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

Developer(s)
Koei Tecmo, Game Freak
Genre(s)
Life Simulation, Simulation
Platform(s)
Nintendo Switch 2
Powered by
  • Planned Release Date: 3/5/26
  • Planned Systems: Switch 2

Pokemon Pokopia looks like a weird Pokemon spinoff, but it also has an intriguing premise. A Ditto has lost its trainer, so in the meantime, it transforms into a human to help take care of Pokemon on this deserted island.

Players can learn moves as Ditto, like ways to chop grass or water crops from fellow Pokemon in this building sim. It may not reach the heights of Minecraft in terms of popularity or creative options, but the odd form of Ditto alone makes this game intriguing.

Monster Hunter Stories 3: Twisted Reflection

Fly High, Dragon Rider

Monster Hunter Stories 3: Twisted Reflection
RPG
Creature Collector
Exploration
Adventure
Systems
Released
March 13, 2026

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

Developer(s)
Capcom
Genre(s)
RPG, Creature Collector, Exploration, Adventure
Platform(s)
PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Nintendo Switch 2, PC
Powered by
  • Planned Release Date: 3/13/26
  • Planned Systems: PC, PS5, Switch 2, and Xbox Series X/S

Monster Hunter Stories 3: Twisted Reflection is an upcoming turn-based RPG that is unlike the mainline action-based titles. Players will be able to steal monster eggs, hatch them as their own, and then take them into battle along with other hunters out there.

Like previous titles, there will be a semi-open world to explore, which can be enhanced via mounts. There might be some mount-based action as well, based on the footage shown in trailers. Mysteries will be solved in a few months, and this could be the entry that changes everything.

Pragmata

Hacking Battles

Pragmata
Action
Adventure
Third-Person Shooter
Systems
Released
April 24, 2026

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

Genre(s)
Action, Adventure, Third-Person Shooter
Powered by
  • Release Date: 4/24/26
  • Planned Systems: PC, PS5, Switch 2, and, Xbox Series X/S

Pragmata is an upcoming new game from Capcom, starring a space explorer, Hugh, and a little girl he discovers, whom he names Diana. She’s an android who can hack the various robotic enemies players come across, but Hugh can shoot enemies too.

The game has been around for a long time since it was initially shown off in 2020, along with the PS5 for the first time. So, needless to say, Pragmata has been cooking, but hopefully that’s a good thing, which will result in another big new franchise from Capcom.

007 First Light

Bond, Delayed Bond

007 First Light
Action
Adventure
Stealth
Systems
Released
May 27, 2026

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
Teen / Blood, Language, Violence
Genre(s)
Action, Adventure, Stealth
Powered by
  • Planned Release Date: 5/27/26
  • Planned Systems: PC, PS5, Switch 2, Xbox Series X/S

It’s been a long time since a new James Bond title was released, and 007 First Light is taking things back to basics with a younger, fresh out of the academy version of the beloved action spy. There will be a sneaking mission involving numerous ways to deal with guards non-lethally.

Players will be able to crouch through bushes, climb through windows, and there will even be driving segments. Since it is IO Interactive, players can be confident in the polish this game will get, based on their work with the open-ended structure of the recent Hitman games.

The Duskbloods

Bloodborne 2*

The Duskbloods
Action
Systems
Released
2026

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

Genre(s)
Action
Powered by
  • Planned Release Date: 2026
  • Planned Systems: Switch 2

The Duskbloods is going to be a Switch 2 exclusive, and it’s the next game being developed by FromSoftware. It looks like a spiritual successor to Bloodborne , which came out in 2015, thanks to the gothic setting and the costume design of the characters.

Beyond the hack-and-slash nature of typical Soulslikes, there are some interesting powers introduced in the initial trailer, like turning into a T. rex head to bite enemies. So far, it seems like there will be a greater emphasis on PvP-style gameplay, but most details about this game still remain unclear, so it could be more than that.

Fire Emblem: Fortune’s Weave

Prepare The Colosseum

Fire Emblem: Fortune's Weave
RPG
Tactical
Systems
Released
2026
Developer(s)
Intelligent Systems
Publisher(s)
Nintendo

Genre(s)
RPG, Tactical
Platform(s)
Nintendo Switch 2
Powered by
  • Planned Release Date: 2026
  • Planned Systems: Switch 2

Fire Emblem is another series that fans have been waiting to see for a while, but Fire Emblem: Fortune’s Weave should arrive sometime in 2026. Only one trailer has been shown so far, and it looks like it will feature a wide cast of characters set within a Roman-like colosseum.

While most battles in the trailer are in this coliseum, there are others in fields, too. The gameplay looks similar to other entries within this tactical RPG series, complete with weapon selection, classes, and specials. How this ties into the larger franchise is a good question that players will have to wait on.

Orbitals

A Two-Player Anime

Orbitals
Adventure
Puzzle
Sci-Fi
Systems
Released
2026

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

Developer(s)
Shapefarm KK
Genre(s)
Adventure, Puzzle, Sci-Fi
Platform(s)
Nintendo Switch 2
Powered by
  • Planned Release Date: 2026
  • Planned Systems: Switch 2

For the co-op enthusiasts in the crowd, Orbitals looks like it could be the next It Takes Two phenomenon, and that’s not just because it is a co-op-only game. The visuals alone help it stand out as it is drawn like an anime from the 80s or 90s, complete with a grainy filter. Players will each command an explorer, Maki or Omura, who is trying to prevent their station from falling victim to some sort of threat.

Newsletter: Smart Switch 2 game picks and insights

Subscribe to our newsletter to receive focused coverage of upcoming Switch 2 releases, curated wishlist recommendations, and hands-on impressions and analysis — everything you need to weigh which titles on your Switch 2 roster matter most.
By subscribing, you agree to receive newsletter and marketing emails, and accept Valnet’s Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. You can unsubscribe anytime.

There are flying, spaceship, and run-and-gun sections shown so far, and it will be interesting to see how much variety the final game will have compared to other co-op-only games.

Mina The Hollower

A Retro Zelda-Like

Mina the Hollower
Platformer
Action
Adventure
Systems
Developer(s)
Yacht Club Games

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

Genre(s)
Platformer, Action, Adventure
Powered by
  • Planned Release Date: TBA
  • Planned Systems: PC, PS4, PS5, Switch, Switch 2, Xbox One, and Xbox Series X/S

Mina the Hollower was supposed to launch on most major platforms in October 2025, but then it was quietly delayed to a new, unspecified date. Hopefully, that means it will be here sooner rather than later since the previous demos already felt fully featured. The game itself is a spiritual homage to action-adventure games from the Game Boy era, like The Legend of Zelda: Link’s Awakening .

As Mina, players can attack enemies with a variety of weapons, dig underground, and level up. This will be the successor to Yacht Club Games’s Shovel Knight , so the pressure is on to impress.

item.title: Roblox Tunados Brasil Codes (January 2026)
item.description:
Get ready to rev up in Tunados Brasil on Roblox , the coolest car tuning playground ever. Jump into Brazilian classics, slap on mega turbos, tweak engines, and boom—backfires and turbo whooshes everywhere. Customize paint, rims, and speedometers, then tear up drag strips, chill at car meets, or cruise sunny streets showing off your speedy beast. Race pals, collect cash, and build the ultimate ride that turns heads.

These working codes are your turbo boost, handing free cash to snag fancy parts fast—no boring grind. Skip slow starts and zoom straight to epic builds and wins.

Updated January 12, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Tunados Brasil has a newly added reward that gives you extra money to use on upgrades and customization. It is a simple bonus meant to help you progress a bit faster without extra effort. Rewards like this are usually time-limited and can be changed or removed with updates. Checking in regularly helps make sure you do not miss similar additions later. Keep an eye out for future updates that may bring more rewards.

All Tunados Brasil Codes

Are there Working Tunados Brasil Codes?

  • 2M VISITS - Money (NEW)

Expired Tunados Brasil Codes

  • 100K VISITS
  • 50K VISITS

Promo codes and their sweet rewards are game-changers in Tunados Brasil . That instant influx of cash from each one lets you dash to the shop for shiny chrome rims, roaring turbos, or engine upgrades that make your car fly. Without waiting hours to earn bucks, you hatch powerful builds quickly. These freebies spark creativity, help smash leaderboards, and unlock rarer parts for wild custom looks. Devs toss them out for big visits or updates, keeping races fresh (and your garage packed with winners). Imagine crossing the finish line first, crowd cheering—codes make that dream rev real, turning grindy waits into non-stop speed thrills.

How to Redeem Tunados Brasil Codes

  • First, join the official community of this Roblox game.
  • Fire up Roblox and hop into Tunados Brasil .
  • Click Play.
  • Finish a quick tutorial.
  • Spot the bird icon on the left side of your screen—tap it.
  • Type a working code into the "CODE" box (watch for spelling).
  • Smash the "REDEEM" button and watch your cash pour in.

How to Get More Tunados Brasil Codes

Hop into the official Gomex Studios Roblox community—that's where devs share hot updates and code drops during races or milestones. We refresh this guide all the time with the newest scoops, so swing by often to fuel up your next big win.

item.title: Roblox: Bee Garden Codes (January 2026)
item.description:
Bee Garden is a fun game where you can manage your own garden and collect various bees and flowers. With their help, you will be able to produce honey and earn money by selling it. In order to increase your income, you will need the rarest flowers and bees, and buying them is not cheap.

Luckily, the game features coupons that provide you with useful rewards, and here, we will talk about them. This Roblox guide will tell you about Bee Garden codes and explain how to redeem them.

Updated January 12, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Bee Garden has received a fresh update that adds new rewards you can claim right now. These rewards focus on spins and helpful boosts that make daily progression smoother. It’s a good opportunity to stock up on useful items without extra effort. Updates like this usually come alongside events or milestones. Check back later to see if more rewards are added soon.

All Bee Garden Codes

Working Bee Garden Codes

  • MERRYCHRISTMAS – Gives you Spins. (NEW)
  • beegarden – Gives you x2 Daily Spins, x1 Silver Charm, and x1 Luck Fountain.
  • release – Gives you x2 Daily Spins, x1 Silver Charm, and x1 Luck Fountain.

Expired Bee Garden Codes

Currently, Bee Garden doesn’t have expired promo codes. We will update this section of the article if any of these coupons become unavailable.

In Bee Garden , you will need to purchase various eggs and hatch them to get new plants. The bees you bought from the shop will then use these flowers to produce honey, which is your main source of income. This Roblox game provides you with various items that can help you make your garden more profitable, such as Luck Fountains. These consumables will increase your Luck if you place them next to your eggs.

Some codes can provide you with free Luck Fountains, and we highly recommend that you take advantage of them as soon as possible. In addition, these coupons will give you Daily Spins that you can use to get free rewards from a special prize wheel.

How to Redeem Bee Garden Codes

The rewards you can obtain by using Bee Garden codes can help you get extra money or rarer plants. Luckily, the redemption process is very simple, and you can claim all your freebies in a few clicks. Here’s the list of steps you need to follow to redeem all available Bee Garden codes:

  • Launch Bee Garden and wait for the experience to load.
  • Once you are in the game, click on the Store button on the left side of the screen.
  • After that, scroll down the Store menu until you see the line where you can type codes.
  • Enter the code you want to activate.
  • Click on the Redeem button.
  • The reward is yours.

How to Get New Bee Garden Codes

The developers of Bee Garden may create more promo codes in the future, and if this happens, we will add such coupons to our list. So, you can bookmark this guide and check it from time to time for updates. Also, you can follow the official media related to Bee Garden :

  • X Account
  • Discrod Server
  • Roblox Group

Roblox

item.title: Roblox: Swerve Codes (January 2026)
item.description:
Swerve is a Roblox game for real car enthusiasts, where everyone can find a vehicle to their liking. The game features high-quality models of real cars, from inexpensive mass-produced models to powerful hypercars. You can test drive them on a huge map with tracks that allow you to fully test the power of the cars up to their maximum speed.

You can also race with other players on special tracks or even at the airport. Of course, to win, you need a powerful car, and those cost millions. Therefore, we recommend using several Swerve codes to get some money for free.

Updated January 12, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Swerve has a newly added reward that gives you extra cash to work with right away. It is a simple way to boost your balance and make progression feel a bit smoother, especially if you are saving up for upgrades or new options. Alongside this update, there are still several other rewards that can help you build momentum. These bonuses can change as the game continues to grow. Checking back later is a good way to avoid missing future additions.

All Swerve Codes

Working Swerve Codes

  • 6KLIKES - Redeem this code to get Cash. (NEW)
  • thanksgiving - Redeem this code to get 1,000,000 Cash.
  • 5MVISITS - Redeem this code to get 1,000,000 Cash.
  • lilbaby - Redeem this code to get 500,000 Cash.
  • sorry4wait - Redeem this code to get 2,000,000 Cash.

Expired Swerve Codes

There are no expired codes for Swerve yet. All codes are currently active.

How to Redeem Codes in Swerve

In Roblox games, codes are a common feature that let users unlock free bonuses in a few simple steps. Although every game has a different interface layout, the button you need is typically visible. As a result, new players may not always be able to locate the redeem option right away. We've outlined the procedures you must follow in order to redeem Swerve codes and gather all of the rewards to make the process simpler:

  • Launch Roblox and open Swerve .
  • Click on the triangle on the right side of the screen to open the menu.
  • Go to the settings tab.
  • At the bottom of the window, you will see a text field. Paste the code from the list of working codes into this field and press Enter on your keyboard.

To get all the rewards, redeem the codes as soon as possible because they may expire over time.

How to Get More Swerve Codes

Frequently, new promo codes emerge, particularly when developers introduce new features or launch events. They post them in the game description or on social media, but players often ignore those announcements. We compile all active codes here and regularly update the list to make things easier.

GR Report: Subscribe and never miss what matters

By subscribing, you agree to receive newsletter and marketing emails, and accept Valnet’s Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. You can unsubscribe anytime.

Save this guide so you can come back at any time to obtain new codes without having to look through several different sources. However, if you are still interested in viewing the developers' posts, you will find all the necessary links below:

  • Swerve Roblox game page
  • Swerve Roblox group
  • Swerve Discord server

item.title: Roblox: Hitman Card Game Codes (January 2026)
item.description:
Dive into the exciting world of Hitman Card Game on Roblox , where you play a strategic card battle. You and other players take turns pulling cards from a deck, but watch out—you don't want to grab the scary Hitman Card that knocks you out. Use clever cards to peek ahead, skip turns, or mess with opponents. The last player standing wins big.

It's perfect for quick matches with buddies, and the more cards and cool skins you have, the better your chances. That's why grabbing working Hitman Card Game codes is a good idea, as they give a bunch of rewards to boost your deck without grinding. These goodies make your game way more fun.

Updated January 12, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Hitman Card Game has received a fresh reward tied to a recent update, giving you a bit more value if you check in now. These freebies are designed to support early progression and help you expand your options without much effort. They can be especially useful if you are still getting comfortable with the core mechanics. Rewards like this are often time-limited or adjusted over time. It is worth returning regularly to see if more bonuses are added later.

All Hitman Card Game Codes

Working Hitman Card Game Codes

  • HAPPYHOLIDAYS - freebies (NEW)
  • STARTERPACK - freebies

Expired Hitman Card Game Codes

  • 365DAYS - freebies

Codes and rewards like these are a game-changer in Hitman Card Game . Free charms and banners let you show off your style to friends, making every match feel special. Legendary sleeves upgrade your deck, helping you outsmart rivals and win more rounds. Without them, you'd spend ages earning chips in the shop, but codes give instant power-ups. They make playing faster, funnier, and fairer for everyone—especially new players. Plus, they keep the game fresh with birthday themes. Always redeem quickly before they vanish.

How to Redeem Hitman Card Game Codes

It will take you a few seconds to redeem codes in this Roblox game:

  • Jump into Hitman Card Game on Roblox and head to the main menu.
  • Tap the Shop button on the screen.
  • Click the Secret Codes tab.
  • Type the code.
  • Hit Enter on your keyboard, and boom—rewards are yours.

How to Get More Hitman Card Game Codes

The best spots for fresh promo codes are the official places where developers drop them first. Join the Hitman Card Game Discord server to chat and snag new ones in the codes channel. Check out the Hitman Studio Roblox group too, where the developers post updates. We keep hunting and testing every new code to keep this article fresh with the latest working codes. Swing back soon or bookmark it—you won't miss a single freebie.
